item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "Shall a man go and hang himself because he belongs to the race of pygmies, and not be the biggest pygmie that he can? Let everyone mind his own business, and endeavor to be what he was made" -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "Maybe this world is another planet’s hell." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I'm killing time while I wait for life to shower me with meaning and happiness." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "You may not be her first, her last, or her only. She loved before she may love again. But if she loves you now, what else matters? She's not perfect—you aren't either, and the two of you may never be perfect together but if she can make you laugh, cause you to think twice, and admit to being human and making mistakes, hold onto her and give her the most you can. She may not be thinking about you every second of the day, but she will give you a part of her that she knows you can break—her heart. So don't hurt her, don't change her, don't analyze and don't expect more than she can give. Smile when she makes you happy, let her know when she makes you mad, and miss her when she's not there." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Audrey Hepburn
item.description: "There is one difference between a long life & a great dinner; in the dinner, the sweet things come last." -- Audrey Hepburn

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "This worked out perfectly for me in college, because what nineteen-year-old Virginia boy doesn't want a wide-hipped, sarcastic Greek girl with short hair that's permed on top? What's that you say? None of them want that? You are correct." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Girls aren't beautiful, they're pretty. Beautiful is too heavy a word to assign to a girl. Women are beautiful because their faces show that they know they have lost something and picked up something else." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Don't do anything by half. If you love someone, love them with all your soul. When you go to work, work your ass off. When you hate someone, hate them until it hurts." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "Do it or don't. It's amazing how many things in life are that easy." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "if i was a woman these days, i'd be killing motherfuckers. my handgun would never cool and my hands would be covered in testicular blood. i would have a horrible reputation with a lot of men because i would be calling them on their weak bullshit left and right." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Dennis Lehane
item.description: "Men. If you give them half a chance, they'll fuck you over just to prove they can." -- Dennis Lehane

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Ignore any loss of nerve, ignore any loss of self-confidence, ignore any doubt or confusion. Move on believing in love, in peace, and harmony, and in great accomplishment. Remember joy isn't a stranger to you. You are winning and you are strong. Love. Love first, love always, love forever." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Henry Rollins
item.description: "It hurts to let go. Sometimes it seems the harder you try to hold on to something or someone the more it wants to get away. You feel like some kind of criminal for having felt, for having wanted. For having wanted to be wanted. It confuses you, because you think that your feelings were wrong and it makes you feel so small because it's so hard to keep it inside when you let it out and it doesn't coma back. You're left so alone that you can't explain. Damn, there's nothing like that, is there? I've been there and you have too. You're nodding your head." -- Henry Rollins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "For the two of us, home isn't a place. It is a person. And we are finally home." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "Education is the ability to listen to almost anything without losing your temper or your self-confidence." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Believe you can and you're halfway there." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Samantha Young
item.description: "Sarcasm is such an unattractive quality in anyone but me." -- Samantha Young

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Steve Hall
item.description: "The truest form of love is how you behave toward someone, not how you feel about them." -- Steve Hall

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "But you can't make people listen. They have to come round in their own time, wondering what happened and why the world blew up around them. It can't last." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "For those who believe in God, most of the big questions are answered. But for those of us who can't readily accept the God formula, the big answers don't remain stone-written. We adjust to new conditions and discoveries. We are pliable. Love need not be a command nor faith a dictum. I am my own god. We are here to unlearn the teachings of the church, state, and our educational system. We are here to drink beer. We are here to kill war. We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that Death will tremble to take us." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Conan O'Brien
item.description: "A study in the Washington Post says that women have better verbal skills than men. I just want to say to the authors of that study: 'Duh." -- Conan O'Brien

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Tad Williams
item.description: "We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we don't know, afraid of what others will think, afraid of what will be found out about us. But every time we tell a lie, the thing that we fear grows stronger." -- Tad Williams

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "To those who are given much, much is expected." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Kristy add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "And now we welcome the new year, full of things that have never been" -- Rainer Maria Rilke
